imdb.title: The Legend of Korra
imdb.plot: Avatar Korra fights to keep Republic City safe from the evil forces of both the physical and spiritual worlds.

episodes.title: After All These Years
episodes.plot: The Metal Clan's new leader Kuvira is making some big changes. In Republic City, people are waiting to see Korra again but something is wrong.

episodes.title: Korra Alone
episodes.plot: While Korra is struggling with PTSD by the metal poison Zaheer injected in her, she sets off on a journey to try to connect with Raava. Amidst all of this, Tenzin and the others realize that Korra has gone missing after 6 months.

episodes.title: The Coronation
episodes.plot: The day of Wu's coronation has arrived, but Kuvira has other ideas. Toph helps out Korra.

episodes.title: The Calling
episodes.plot: The airbender children, Jinora, Ikki and Meelo, head out to find the Avatar. Meanwhile, Toph teaches Korra to let go of the past.

episodes.title: Enemy at the Gates
episodes.plot: Kuvira threatens Zaofu; Bolin is caught in the middle of the bad blood between Su Beifong and Kuvira.

episodes.title: The Battle of Zaofu
episodes.plot: Korra returns to her role as the avatar, but is she really ready for action? Bolin and Varrick break away from Kuvira's army.

episodes.title: Reunion
episodes.plot: Korra returns to Republic City and Team Avatar faces their first mission together in three years when Prince Wu goes missing. Bolin and Varrick are on the lam.

episodes.title: Remembrances
episodes.plot: Mako, Korra, Varrick and Bolin reminisce on past events.

episodes.title: Beyond the Wilds
episodes.plot: The spirit vines in Republic City start abducting people and it's up to Korra to figure out why.

episodes.title: Operation Beifong
episodes.plot: Bolin helps Opal and Lin save the Beifongs from Kuvira. Korra visits the Spirit World looking for help.

episodes.title: Kuvira's Gambit
episodes.plot: Korra and Team Avatar try to stop Kuvira from moving against Republic City.

episodes.title: Day of the Colossus
episodes.plot: Team Avatar clashes with Kuvira on the streets of Republic City; Pema and Prince Wu help evacuate innocent citizens.

episodes.title: The Last Stand
episodes.plot: When Korra comes face to face with Kuvira, the fate of the Earth Kingdom and the Avatar's life are at stake.

episodes.title: A Breath of Fresh Air
episodes.plot: As Korra tries to restore the streets of Republic city, she learns that her decision to keep the spirit portals open has created a new conflict between humans and spirits, and triggered the emerging of new Airbenders.

episodes.title: Rebirth
episodes.plot: As the Avatar team faces difficulties while searching for new airbenders, Zaheer makes the next step in his plan.

episodes.title: The Earth Queen
episodes.plot: Korra and Asami collect tax money for Queen Hou Ting. Mako and Bolin suffer an unexpected family reunion. Kai can't get rid of his old habit. Lord Zuko visits a secret prison in Northen Water Tribe.

episodes.title: In Harm's Way
episodes.plot: Korra finds out that the Earth Queen imprisoned airbenders to create an army. Jinora leads an investigation with her spiritual projection. Lin joins the Avatar Team.

episodes.title: The Metal Clan
episodes.plot: Korra, Mako, Bolin and Asami visit Sao Fu, the city of Metal Clan. Lin does not want to meet her past. Suyin tells her life story. Air Temple Island training camp has a new recruit.

episodes.title: Old Wounds
episodes.plot: Korra practices metal bending. Lin takes an acupuncture session. Zaheer, Ghazan, Ming-Hua and P'Li escape Republic City.

episodes.title: Original Airbenders
episodes.plot: Though contending with Bumi's bad attitude, Tenzin tries to train the new members of the Air Nation.

episodes.title: The Terror Within
episodes.plot: As Opal leaves for the Northern Air Temple to start her airbending training, Zaheer and his gang try to kidnap Korra. Although Korra's friends are able to prevent this following a climactic fight, they suspect that someone inside Zaofu has been aiding the enemy.

episodes.title: The Stakeout
episodes.plot: While tracking Aiwei, Korra finds out more about Zaheer's motivations and purposes. Team Avatar is chased by both Zaheer's gang and the Earth Queen.

episodes.title: Long Live the Queen
episodes.plot: Korra and Asami are captured by Earth Kingdom forces and held in an airship en route to Ba Sing Se, and Asami's escape plan leads to a worse situation.

episodes.title: The Ultimatum
episodes.plot: As Ba Sing Se continues to erupt into chaos, Mako and Bolin struggle to leave the city to deliver Zaheer's message to Korra they were going to attack the Northern Air Temple.

episodes.title: Enter the Void
episodes.plot: Team Avatar hatches a plan to save the Airbenders, but all is not what it seems like. Zaheer rediscovers an old Airbender talent. The motive of the Red Lotus is finally revealed.

episodes.title: Venom of the Red Lotus
episodes.plot: After being captured and poisoned by the Red Lotus, Korra must fight to keep herself from being killed in the Avatar State, which would end the entire Avatar Cycle forever.

episodes.title: Rebel Spirit
episodes.plot: Korra struggles to find a deeper connection with the Spirit World as she and the gang attend a Southern Water Tribe festival.

episodes.title: The Southern Lights
episodes.plot: Korra and Chief Unalaq journey into a dangerous maelstrom and find a source of great spiritual power.

episodes.title: Civil Wars: Part 1
episodes.plot: While tensions flare between the Northern and Southern Water Tribes, Korra struggles to remain neutral.

episodes.title: Civil Wars: Part 2
episodes.plot: When Korra's parents are wrongfully arrested, Korra fights for their freedom.

episodes.title: Peacekeepers
episodes.plot: When the President of the United Republic refuses to help Korra, she decides to take matters into her own hands.

episodes.title: The Sting
episodes.plot: When Triad activity threatens to put Future Industries out of business, Mako performs an investigation and discovers a much bigger conspiracy.

episodes.title: Beginnings, Part 1
episodes.plot: Korra learns about the epic and mythic origins of the first Avatar.

episodes.title: Beginnings, Part 2
episodes.plot: Korra delves deeper into the Avatar's past and realizes what she must do in order to restore balance between the physical and spirit worlds.

episodes.title: The Guide
episodes.plot: Korra seeks Tenzin's help to enter the Spirit World for the first time.

episodes.title: A New Spiritual Age
episodes.plot: Korra enters the Spirit World and struggles with the Avatar's relationship with the spirits.

episodes.title: Night of a Thousand Stars
episodes.plot: When President Raiko is attacked, Bolin saves the day.

episodes.title: Harmonic Convergence
episodes.plot: Korra and company attempt to close the spirit portals before Harmonic Convergence.

episodes.title: Darkness Falls
episodes.plot: Korra discovers a new twist in Unalaq's evil plan. Meanwhile, Tenzin realizes he must face his own demons in order to save his daughter.

episodes.title: Light in the Dark
episodes.plot: Korra discovers a way she may be able to defeat the ultimate dark spirit and save the world.

episodes.title: Welcome to Republic City
episodes.plot: Korra, the new Avatar, travels to Republic city to start her Airbending training.

episodes.title: A Leaf in the Wind
episodes.plot: Against Tenzin's prohibition, a frustrated Korra sneaks out to visit the pro-bending sports arena.

episodes.title: The Revelation
episodes.plot: Korra attempts to infiltrate the Equalist movement and learn more about its mysterious leader.

episodes.title: The Voice in the Night
episodes.plot: Korra becomes part of Councilman Tarrlok's task force which aims to rid Republic City of the Equalists.

episodes.title: The Spirit of Competition
episodes.plot: As Asami steals Mako's heart, Korra struggles to express her feelings for Mako and also at the same time Bolin tries to win Korra's heart by being brave enough to ask Korra to go out with him. The tension gets higher as the Pro bending tournament starts.

episodes.title: And the Winner Is...
episodes.plot: Korra and the Fire Ferrets are in the pro-bending championship, but will the Equalists allow the game to go on?

episodes.title: The Aftermath
episodes.plot: Korra suspects that an ally is working with the Equalists.

episodes.title: When Extremes Meet
episodes.plot: Korra faces off with Councilman Tarrlok as Equalist activity continues to rise in Republic City.

episodes.title: Out of the Past
episodes.plot: After being imprisoned by Tarrlok, Korra attempts to analyze the mysterious visions she has been having. Meanwhile, Tenzin, Lin, Mako, Bolin and Asami search for Korra, having been given false information by Tarrlok.

episodes.title: Turning the Tides
episodes.plot: The Equalists begin their attack on Republic City.

episodes.title: Skeletons in the Closet
episodes.plot: Korra and the rest of Team Avatar go into hiding in Gommu's underground shelter where benders and non-benders live together in harmony.

episodes.title: Endgame
episodes.plot: The duel between Amon and Korra - will Korra be powerful enough to beat Amon?
